identity.name: PropBoost AI
identity.mission: Empower Dubai real estate agents with a luxurious, mobile-first productivity suite that blends AI efficiency with high-end aesthetics.
identity.target_audience: Mid-tier Dubai real estate agents (mobile-first hustlers)

usage_rules: Use Navy (#001F3F) for sidebars, headers, and primary buttons to establish trust.
Use Gold (#D4AF37) sparingly for KPIs, active states, borders of premium items, and icons.
Backgrounds should be clean white or very light gray (#F8FAFC) to maintain readability in bright sunlight.
Avoid gradients on text. Use solid colors for maximum contrast.

rules: Headings in 'Playfair Display' to evoke luxury.
Body text in 'Outfit' for modern readability.
For Arabic content, switch font-family to 'Tajawal' and direction to RTL.
Use Gold color for key numbers (e.g., Deal Value, Lead Score).

buttons.primary: bg-[#001F3F] text-white hover:bg-[#001F3F]/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#001F3F] border border-[#001F3F] hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium
buttons.gold: bg-[#D4AF37] text-white hover:bg-[#D4AF37]/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium shadow-lg

cards.base: bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm hover:border-[#D4AF37]/30 transition-colors
cards.property: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border-0 shadow-md

inputs.base: h-12 rounded-lg border-gray-200 focus:border-[#001F3F] focus:ring-[#001F3F]/20 bg-gray-50/50

dashboard_structure.sidebar: hidden md:flex flex-col w-64 bg-[#001F3F] text-white h-screen fixed left-0 top-0 z-50
dashboard_structure.mobile_nav: md:hidden fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white border-t border-gray-200 h-16 flex justify-around items-center z-50 pb-safe
dashboard_structure.main_content: md:ml-64 min-h-screen bg-[#F8FAFC] p-4 pb-24 md:p-8

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. For gold accents, apply 'text-[#D4AF37]'.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Day Luxury' theme: White backgrounds, Navy headers, Gold accents.
Ensure all text is legible in bright sunlight (high contrast).
Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1-H3 headings.
Use 'Outfit' for body text and UI elements.
Create a 'LeadScore' component that uses a circular progress bar with Gold/Navy colors.
The 'Pipeline' board must be horizontally scrollable on mobile.
For Arabic support, wrap the app in a DirectionProvider that toggles 'dir=rtl' on the root html tag.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds, only for subtle text effects or button hovers.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
